title: Dubai: Modern Marvels

itinerary.title: Arrival & City Orientation
itinerary.description: Welcome to Dubai. Transfer to your hotel in the heart of the city. Evening at leisure to adjust to the time zone.

itinerary.title: Iconic Landmarks
itinerary.description: Visit Burj Khalifa, the world's tallest building. Explore Dubai Mall and witness the Palm Jumeirah from above.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari Experience
itinerary.description: Afternoon desert safari with dune bashing, camel rides, and traditional Bedouin dinner under the stars.

itinerary.title: Cultural & Shopping Day
itinerary.description: Explore traditional souks, visit the Dubai Museum, and enjoy world-class shopping at Dubai Mall or Souk Madinat.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out and transfer to Dubai International Airport for your flight home.

description: Experience the best of Dubai, where modern architecture meets Arabian tradition. From the world's tallest building to golden desert dunes, this journey showcases Dubai's ambition and heritage. Perfect for first-time visitors seeking both luxury and adventure.
